thread.title: TV | Tower Heist

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | Tower Heist
text: Around the time that this film came out, there was huge buzz about it being Eddie Murphy's "comeback movie". While that didn't prove to be true at all, it's nonetheless a fun, genuinely entertaining comedy heist movie with an excellent cast. Ben Stiller, Casey Affleck, Matthew Broderick, Gabourey Sidibe, Michael Peña, Alan Alda and Téa Leoni also star in what might be journeyman helmer Brett Ratner's best movie. New York looks absolutely gorgeous in it too. Definitely worth a butchers.
